context: Major logistics company evaluating autonomous vehicle deployment for long-haul trucking operations

request.purpose: Deploy 500 autonomous trucks for long-haul routes, including vehicle acquisition, infrastructure, and training
request.justification: Address driver shortages, reduce operating costs by 30%, improve safety metrics

decision_process.outcome: Successful pilot with 95% uptime and 40% cost reduction
Approved for phased deployment starting Q2 2026

business_impact.expected_outcome: 30% reduction in operating costs, 50% improvement in safety metrics, solution to driver shortage crisis
business_impact.projected_value: $150,000,000 annual savings, $500,000,000 in avoided driver recruitment costs over 5 years

lessons_learned: Pilot programs essential for risk mitigation, regulatory engagement critical, infrastructure investment underestimated, public communication strategy needed
